select * from product where name like '%' || #{name} || '%' order by name asc
mapper.insert: insert into product(pseq, name, kind, aprice, kprice, image, parea, sarea, address) values(pseq_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{kind}, #{aprice}, #{kprice}, #{image}, #{parea}, #{sarea}, #{address})
mapper.select: select * from product where address like '%' || #{address} || '%' order by pseq asc
